titleStmt.title: Truth prevailing against the fiercest opposition being a vindication of Dr. Russel's True narrative of the Portsmouth disputation ... Also, a sermon upon Mat. 28. 19. by Mr. John Williams ... As also An answer to the Presbyterian dialogue, by another hand / published by Mr. John Sharp ... who was moderator at the disputation in Portsmouth.
titleStmt.author: Sharp, John, of Froome, Somersetshire.
Williams, John, minister.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by M. Fabian ...,

notesStmt.note: "Sermon on Mat. 28. 10. by Mr. John Williams" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
